slnt.commands: !sr <youtube url>: add a Youtube video !session: get the current session url !song: currently playing song !extension: read about our browser extension !slnt: read about SLNT !commands: all commands
slnt.about: SLNT allows the streamer to play any kind of music (even copyrighted music!) and sync it with you, the viewer. For more information go to https://slnt.stream/
slnt.extension: The SLNT browser plugin makes it possible you to listen to your SLNT session without delay: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/slntstream/beljoephfogglpicaemgcebfddbmelpi

session.created: {channel} has started a SLNT session! Listen and watch along via https://slnt.stream/hub/session/{sessionId}
session.inactive: {channel} does not have an active SLNT session!
session.link: Join my SLNT stream and listen/watch along to my videos: https://slnt.stream/hub/session/{sessionId}
session.stopped: {channel} has stopped their SLNT session. Thank you for listening!
session.requestLimit: @{user} please wait {seconds} seconds before requesting a song again!
session.requestDisabled: You do not have permission to add song requests.
session.requestMissing: Please add a valid Youtube link to your request.
session.requestFailed: We couldn't retrieve that video. Please try again.
